product_name: SRAM Climber's Kit - Rival Rear Derailleur / 11-32 10-Speed Cassette / 1051 Chain
long_description: Upgrade your bike for conquering challenging climbs, this SRAM Climber's kit includes a Rival rear derailleur, 11-32 10-speed cassette and a chain to make easier work of ascents.
short_description: Upgrade your bike for conquering challenging climbs, this SRAM Climber's kit includes a Rival rear derailleur, 11-32 10-speed cassette and a chain to make easier work of ascents.
